columns.Player_ID: The unique identifier for each player.
columns.Player: The name of the player, including any identifiers.
columns.Years_Played: The duration the player has participated in matches.
columns.Total_WL: The overall wins and losses record for the player.
columns.Singles_WL: The wins and losses record in singles matches.
columns.Doubles_WL: The wins and losses record in doubles matches.
columns.Team: The identifier for the team the player belongs to.

player.table_description: The table tracks player performance in matches during a season.

columns.Country_id: The unique identifier for each country.
columns.Country_name: The official name of the country.
columns.Capital: The capital city of the country.
columns.Official_native_language: The primary language officially recognized in the country.

country.table_description: The table lists countries with their details and primary language.

columns.Team_id: The unique identifier for each team.
columns.Name: The official name of the team.

team.table_description: The table lists teams participating in matches for the season.

columns.Season: The year of the match season.
columns.Player: The name of the player participating in the season.
columns.Position: The playing position of the player on the team.
columns.Country: The identifier for the country associated with the player.
columns.Team: The identifier for the team the player belongs to.
columns.Draft_Pick_Number: The selection number for the player in the draft.
columns.Draft_Class: The name of the draft year or class the player belongs to.
columns.College: The name of the college the player attended before the draft.

match_season.table_description: The table records player details and draft information for each match season.
